MTSP Jin always has this modus operandi in his originals works and it's easy to see once you get used to it. He gives you what looks like glimpses of hope (for vanilla/pure-love readers, or maybe he's just a sadist) but it's not real because once you put attention to the details left behind and in this case also to what comes next it reveals the fallacy of that impression. It's always the same with Sakiko-san, the gym girl (Yudan something) Tachibana family, new wife education, and Fujun something (about a married sensei and his student). Just look at the hidden despair every time he ends a doujin, where the most *positive* outcome is just putting a stop and hoping you never know what happens next (particularly Sakiko and gym girl)
